title: Best Campo Grande hotels with rooftop pools
excerpt: Discovering hotels in Campo Grande with rooftop pools can be a daunting task, as the options are often scattered across various platforms and not all are easily accessible. This curated list not only highlights the best places to unwind with breathtaking views but also saves you time in your search for the perfect getaway. With these selections, you can enjoy a unique blend of relaxation and stunning scenery that will elevate your travel experience.
intro: In this article, readers will uncover the top Campo Grande hotels featuring exquisite rooftop pools that promise both luxury and spectacular views.

hotels.name: Novotel Campo Grande
hotels.description: Novotel Campo Grande offers a serene outdoor swimming pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and lush gardens, perfect for relaxation. Families will appreciate the kids' club, playground, and billiards for fun bonding moments. With complimentary WiFi, room service, and a business center, this hotel guarantees a comfortable and convenient experience for every guest.
hotels.highlight: Novotel Campo Grande boasts a rooftop swimming pool, a kids club, and outdoor furniture for a relaxing experience.

hotels.name: Vertigo Premium Studios - Luxo e Praticidade
hotels.description: Experience the perfect blend of luxury and sustainability at Vertigo Premium Studios, featuring stunning city views from your private balcony. Enjoy modern amenities such as a fully equipped kitchenette, cable TV, and free WiFi, along with culinary delights from the on-site restaurant serving Brazilian cuisine. Relax in the indoor pool, sauna, or peaceful garden, ensuring a serene getaway in a non-smoking, soundproof environment.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a rooftop pool with stunning city views, alongside a sauna and lap pool for ultimate relaxation.
hotels.location: 51 Travessa Ana Vani Edifício Vertigo, Ap. 703

hotels.name: Indaiá Park Hotel
hotels.description: Indaiá Park Hotel offers a blend of luxury and comfort with elegantly decorated air-conditioned rooms, a gym, and a sun terrace pool for relaxation. Guests can indulge in a delicious buffet breakfast and savor international cuisine at the on-site restaurant, all while enjoying refreshing drinks by the pool. Conveniently located just 3 km from Campo Grande International Airport and within walking distance to the city center, the hotel ensures a seamless stay with its 24-hour attentive service.
hotels.highlight: Indaiá Park Hotel boasts a sun terrace pool, elegantly decorated air-conditioned rooms, and a convenient location near the city center.

hotels.name: Jandaia Hotel Campo Grande
hotels.description: Jandaia Hotel, located in the vibrant heart of Campo Grande, offers convenient access to local attractions like Morada dos Baís and Aracy Balabanian Theater. Guests can unwind in comfortable rooms equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning and cable TV, ensuring a pleasant stay. The on-site restaurant provides a delightful dining experience with a menu featuring both regional and international dishes, making it an ideal choice for travelers seeking comfort and culinary excellence.
hotels.highlight: Features a rooftop pool offering scenic views along with comfortable rooms and an on-site restaurant serving diverse cuisine.

hotels.name: Hotel Internacional
hotels.description: Experience relaxation at Hotel Internacional with an inviting outdoor swimming pool and a cozy lounge area. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi and enjoy the convenience of room service during your visit. Ideally situated near key attractions like the Jose Octavio Guizzo Cultural Center and Republic Square, this hotel offers the perfect base for your adventures in Campo Grande.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a stunning rooftop pool with outdoor furniture and a refreshing lap pool for relaxation and leisure.

hotels.name: Brumado Hotel
hotels.description: Discover the Brumado Hotel, a luxurious retreat just 1.5 km from the vibrant center of Campo Grande. Enjoy air-conditioned rooms equipped with modern amenities like flat-screen TVs and minibars, while relaxation awaits by the outdoor pool or in the well-appointed gym. With complimentary Wi-Fi and convenient access to local attractions and transport, Brumado Hotel is your ideal base for an unforgettable city experience.
hotels.highlight: Boasts a rooftop pool with stunning views, alongside a lap pool and a serene Japanese garden for relaxation.

faqs.question: What are the average nightly rates for hotels in Campo Grande with rooftop pools?
faqs.answer: Average nightly rates for hotels in Campo Grande with rooftop pools typically range from R$250 to R$600, depending on the hotel's amenities and location. Luxury options may cost more during peak seasons, so it's advisable to book in advance to secure better rates.

faqs.question: Which hotels in Campo Grande offer infinity pools, and what are their key features?
faqs.answer: Hotels like the Hotel Deville Prime Campo Grande and Novotel Campo Grande feature rooftop infinity pools with stunning city views. These hotels often offer additional amenities such as poolside bars and sun loungers, making them ideal for relaxation during your stay.

faqs.question: Are there any special policies regarding pool access for guests?
faqs.answer: Most hotels with rooftop pools in Campo Grande allow access exclusively for registered guests, ensuring a more private experience. Some hotels may have specific hours for pool access, so it is recommended to check with the hotel prior to your stay for any restrictions or policies.

faqs.question: What is the best area to stay in Campo Grande for easy access to rooftop pool hotels?
faqs.answer: Staying in the center of Campo Grande is ideal for easy access to hotels with rooftop pools, such as those located near Avenida Afonso Pena. This area is vibrant, with numerous dining and shopping options, making it convenient for travelers looking to explore the city while enjoying hotel amenities.

faqs.question: Is it worth it to pay extra for a room with a pool view at these hotels?
faqs.answer: Yes, paying extra for a room with a pool view can enhance your stay, especially in Campo Grande where rooftop pools offer beautiful city vistas. Guests often enjoy a more relaxing atmosphere and the convenience of watching sunsets from their rooms, making it a worthwhile investment for a memorable experience.
